sentences.en: "In anthropology, you can't equate third gender with homosexuality," he said.
sentences.cn: “在人类学中，你不能将同性恋和第三性别混同，”他说。

sentences.en: Anatomical studies on the establishment of physical anthropology with important influence.
sentences.cn: 解剖学的研究对体质人类学的建立有重要影响.

sentences.en: Anthropology is a science dealing with man and his origins.
sentences.cn: 人类学是一门研究人类及其起源的学科.

sentences.en: Archaeoastronomy is the anthropology of astronomy, to distinguish it from the history of astronomy.
sentences.cn: 考古天文学是天文学的人类学，从天文学历史来区分它。

sentences.en: Art is life, which is an essential understanding of art by anthropology.
sentences.cn: 艺术即生活, 这是人类学对艺术的一种基本的理解.

sentences.en: Boas's own research spanned the scope of anthropology in its North American definition.
sentences.cn: 博厄斯自己的研究涉及了北美人类学的整个领域.

sentences.en: Economic botany makes significant contributions to anthropology, botany and environmental conservation.
sentences.cn: 经济植物学为人类学 、 植物学和环境保护作出了重要的贡献.

sentences.en: Elizabeth Angell is a PhD candidate in anthropology at Columbia University.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白?安吉尔目前是哥伦比亚大学人类学博士研究生.

sentences.en: For all its dazzle --- or perhaps because of it -- molecular anthropology is not without critics.
sentences.cn: 或许正因如此,对这一切谜团, 分子人类学受到了批评.

sentences.en: His conclusions are outlined in the October issue of Current Anthropology.
sentences.cn: 他的结论在《现代人类学》于十月份发表.

sentences.en: I believe he has started reading up anthropology.
sentences.cn: 我相信他已开始深入研究人类学.

sentences.en: Not to be the skunk at this party, but I think it's important to ask whether neuroscience reveals anything more than we already know from, say, anthropology.
sentences.cn: 我并不想成为派对上的讨厌鬼，但我认为很重要的是，要问清楚神经科学是否揭示出我们已知之外的东西，比如人类学。

sentences.en: Objective To enrich the morphological basis for anthropology and clinical cosmetology.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的为临床下肢美容术及人类形态学积累资料.

sentences.en: She was a grad student, anthropology and folklore.
sentences.cn: 镰旗┒鐢?涓讳慨浜虹被瀛﹀拰姘戦棿浼犺?

sentences.en: Structural linguistics gave rise to Levi - Strauss's structural anthropology.
sentences.cn: 结构语言学催生了施特劳斯的结构人类学.

sentences.en: The field job is an important part of the study on Anthropology.
sentences.cn: 摘要田野工作本身是人类学研究的重要部分.

sentences.en: This is a communications intensive course for the Anthropology minor and major.
sentences.cn: 这是一堂密集的讨论课程,开给主修或辅修人类学学生.

sentences.en: Thomas Bvarfield ( ed. ), The Dictionary of Anthropology, Blackwell Publishers Ltd. 1997.
sentences.cn: 吴泽霖主编, 《人类学词典》, 上海辞书出版社,1990年.

sentences.en: When I was a student at Cambridge I remember an anthropology professor holding up a picture of a bone with 28 incisions carved in it.
sentences.cn: 当我还在剑桥读书的时候，我记得有一位人类学的教授拿出一张照片，上面是一根有28个切口的骨头。
